TopicTitle: Game crash when launching SPH with VenStockRevMap and Texture Replacer

Articles.Content:
When launching spaceplane from runway with [Texture Replacer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107471-0-90-TextureReplacer-2-2-5-%2830-1-2015%29) and [VenStockRevMap](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92764-90-Stock-Part-Revamp-Update-1-7-2!) both installed, game crashes, when making loop.

Installed mods:

- ModuleManager.2.5.9
- TextureReplacer-2.2.5
- Stock-Revamp-1.7.2

Way to reproduce:

1. Start new sandbox game
2. Launch stock Aries A3 from runway
3. Accelerate at full thrust and after takeoff hold S key to make a loop

Game crashes.

[Crash dump](https://cloud.mail.ru/public/f9563a7b62fc/KSP_crash_log.zip) archive includes a output\_log.txt from KSP\_Data, KSP.log and crach dump folder.

This problem appears only if *both* Texture Replacer and Stock revamp present in game. None of them in separate case this problem.

PS

Actually, when I've encountered this problem, my KSP has over 40 mods installed, but I managed to narrow it to this pair. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Does this happen on a fresh install with only TextureReplacer and Stock Revamp installed since you said you are running over 40 mods?
Yes, it crashes only with this two mods (+module manager) installed.

There are more issues with Vens in combination with texture replacer and reflective surfaces. 

I get a lot of blackscreen with some partcombinations that are welded.

I'll test this as well.

So, it's problem with Texture Replacer.

Temporary fix - remove file ./GameData/VenStockRevamp/PartRevamp\_TextureReplacer.cfg
Problem in Texture Replacer solved in 2.2.6
